All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
The class Account manages user accounts to control access to different functionality of the library system.
Account.AccessLevel
The enum class AccessLevel defines the access level of different type of actors in the library system.
Account.LoginStatus
The enum class LoginStatus defines the status of a login operation.
AccountDB
The class AccountDB manages the user account database file and synchronizes its content with the data in system memory.
AddBook
The class AddBook is the GUI for adding a book to the library system.
Author
The class Author maintains a list of authors in the library system.
Book
The class Book manages the books in the library system.
BookCopy
The class BookCopy manages different copies of the books in the library system.
BookDB
The class BookDB manages book database files and synchronizes their content with the data in system memory.
BookEdition
The class BookEdition manages different editions of the books in the library system.
BookGenre
The class BookGenre manages the genres of books in the library system.
IssueBook
The class IssueBook is the GUI for issuing a book to a borrower.
Item
The class Item is the base class of different types of items in the library system.
Item.StatusCode
The enum class StatusCode defines the status of Add Book, Issue Book, and Return Book operations of the library system.
LibLogger
The class LibLogger write logging data of the library system to a log file.
Librarian
The class Librarian manages the librarians in the library system.
Login
The class Login is the GUI for logging in a user before he is allowed to perform any operations.
Logout
The class Logout is the GUI for logging out a user.
Magazine
The class Magazine manages the magazines in the library system.
MainMenu
The class MainMenu is the main GUI of the library system.
ReturnBook
The class ReturnBook is the GUI for returning a book from a borrower.
TestMainMenu
The class TestMainMenu launches the main GUI of the Librarian module of library system.
Video
The class Video manages the videos in the library system.
ViewBooks
The class ViewBooks is the GUI for adding a book to the library system.
ViewBooks.BookInfo
Class BookInfo defines the data model and provides methods and fields to work with the book data table.
